thread.title: Anglo-Indians and Local Patriotism.

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Anglo-Indians and Local Patriotism.
text: ONE thing that is becoming more clear is that European merchants and others residing in India and having business and other interests should no longer stand aloof from Indians but cultivate a local patriotism and interest in the advancement of India. Sir William Meyer's advise to the Karachi merchants that "the first duty of those who have thrown in their lot with India is to India" deserves to be favourably received not only by merchants but officials and others.
